form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Graham (for himself and Mr. Luján) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to prohibit the slaughter of equines for human consumption.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Save America’s Forgotten Equines Act of 2025 or the SAFE Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on slaughter of equines for human consumption
section.text: Section 12515 of the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (7 U.S.C. 2160) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking dogs and cats and inserting dogs, cats, and equines; and
in subsection (a), by striking a dog or cat each place it appears and inserting a dog, cat, or equine.
